ComicInfo.Penciller: Frank Redondo,Fred Carrillo,Luis Dominguez,Rico Rival,John Calnan,Rico Rival,Frank Redondo,Fred Carrillo
ComicInfo.Summary:
A stewardess' ghost brings a doctor to a plane crash.
A ghostly dog takes revenge when his owner is killed during a robbery.
Colonel Akeridge is haunted by the ghost of a Indian native he had killed for stealing a tiny amount of grain to feed his family.
ComicInfo.Title: Ghosts and the Supernatural; The Strange Haunt of the Andes; The Ghostly Guardian of the Grave!; The Imprisoned Phantom
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
